data.title: Stuart Compiled Mandolin Medley For Funeral
data.text:
Q: Dear Jack Sunn, could you tell me the name of the song that Marty Stuart played/sang at Gov. Kirk Fordice's funeral? - Lucille

A: Jack sought help from Wright and Ferguson Funeral Home in Jackson.

They found the program which shows Stuart played a mandolin medley at funeral in 2004.

Folks in Stuart's office sent word that he compiled the music just for the funeral, centering it around Ashokan's Farewell by Jay Ungar.
